propositions.text: The document is a completed novel titled "十里荒凉胭脂泪".

There are occasional English phrases interspersed.

The text contains a significant amount of non-standard characters, likely due to encoding issues or OCR errors.

The story may involve themes of observation, waiting, and potential change.
The text hints at characters and their relationships.
